plugins.name: session-improver
plugins.description: Analyze Claude Code sessions to find token waste, linter loops, and missing automations, then recommend and apply fixes

plugins.name: apple-reminders
plugins.description: Manage Apple Reminders from Claude Code using remindctl CLI

plugins.name: cli-email

plugins.name: apple-calendar
plugins.description: Manage Apple Calendar from Claude Code using ical CLI with full CRUD, search, and calendar filtering

plugins.name: slack
plugins.description: Slack messaging, status, and search using slk CLI (Slack Gem)
